summary.span: 表示分层站点地图结构中的节点，例如 类和实现抽象 类的类所描述的节点。

span.span: Represents a node in the hierarchical site map structure such as that described by the class and classes that implement the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象表示站点地图结构中的网站页。A object represents a Web site page in a site map structure. 静态加载对象类在运行时使用一个或多个站点地图提供程序将从持久性存储区的站点地图数据加载到内存。 objects are loaded by the static class at run time using one or more site map providers to load site map data from persistent storage into memory. 对象由包装类使用由 Web 服务器控件，如控件。 objects are wrapped by the class for use by Web server controls, such as the control. 类包含多个属性，用于描述 Web 站点，包括描述页上，如属性中的单页， ，和属性。The class includes several properties that are used to describe a single page in a Web site, including properties that describe a page, such as the , , and properties. 而属性可供类，该类是作为提供程序使用来跟踪节点的内部集合中的查找键的默认站点地图提供程序的 ASP.NET，，类支持基本在站点地图提供程序可用于跟踪节点的属性。Whereas the property is used by the class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, as a lookup key in the internal collections that the provider uses to track nodes, the class supports a basic property that can be used by site map providers to track nodes. 此外，导航控件使用属性来呈现页导航结构中的超链接。Additionally, the property is used by navigation controls to render hyperlinks to pages within a navigation structure. 属性是友好名称，通常是 Web 窗体的 HTML 标题相同导航控件用于呈现简单的标签。The property is a friendly name for the , is often the same as the HTML title of a Web Form, and is used by navigation controls to render simple labels. 最后，的其他集合属性是可供站点使用的站点地图提供程序对象，但需要在基类中不可用的其他属性类。Finally, a collection of additional attributes is available to site map providers that use objects, but require additional properties that are not available in the base class. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建新的站点映射节点集合并向其中添加元素。The first code example demonstrates how to create a new site map node collection and add elements to it. 第二个代码示例演示如何从文本文件加载站点地图数据。The second code example demonstrates how to load site map data from a text file. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数创建一个新集合，然后将元素添加到其与方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to create a new collection, and then add elements to it with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/CS/sitemapnode2acs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/VB/sitemapnode2avb.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将`SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`分析文本文件，其中包含以逗号分隔字符串中的站点映射数据。The following code example demonstrates how the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` parses a text file that contains site map data in comma-delimited strings. 一个新对象添加到从文件读取每一行的类的内部跟踪集合。A new object is added to the internal tracking collections of the class for each line that is read from the file. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，该类是默认值提供程序实现的 ASP.NET 中，使用属性用作查找键，如果提供的节点 （如果 URL 是未提供为该节点生成的跟踪标识符）。The class, which is the default provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key, if one is provided for the node (if a URL is not provided, a tracking identifier is generated for the node). 因此，任何控件提供一个 URL，并由提供程序的范围内，必须具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any control that provides a URL and is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，该类是默认值提供程序实现的 ASP.NET 中，使用属性用作查找键，如果提供的节点 （如果 URL 是未提供为该节点生成的跟踪标识符）。The class, which is the default provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key, if one is provided for the node (if a URL is not provided, a tracking identifier is generated for the node). 因此，任何对象，提供一个 URL，并由提供程序的范围内，必须具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any object that provides a URL and is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 的集合属性创建可通过属性，并简化了到站点，可以轻松地应用其他属性将节点映射并扩展其功能而不用派生的自定义类执行此操作。The collection of attributes that the is created with is available through the property, and makes it easy to apply additional attributes to a site map node and extend its capabilities without deriving a custom class to do so. 提供角色，以提供一组可以查看的节点的角色的集合时属性返回`true`。Supply an collection of roles to provide a set of roles that can view the node when the property returns `true`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 提供程序使用属性用作查找键。The provider uses the property as a lookup key. 因此，任何所使用的提供程序的范围内，必须具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any that is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 如果没有`title`或`description`提供，则调用或属性返回字段。If no `title` or `description` is provided, calls to the or properties return an field. 若要以编程方式指定本地化的资源，可以设置的值`implicitResourceKey`为唯一的名称将用于标识的节点或集的本地化的资源`explicitResourceKeys`到的集合`name/value`对，其中`name`是节点属性或自定义属性来本地化和`value`包含的节点属性或自定义属性的本地化值。To programmatically specify resources for localization, either set the value of `implicitResourceKey` to a unique name that will be used to identify localized resources for the node or set `explicitResourceKeys` to a collection of `name/value` pairs where `name` is the node property or custom attribute to localize and `value` contains localization values for the node property or custom attribute. 然后可以在相应的.resx 文件中设置的本地化的值。The localized values can then be set in the appropriate .resx files. 详细了解如何将本地化， ，和任何自定义属性对象，请参阅[如何： 将本地化的站点地图数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be63b4a0-fb82-44b4-bdbb-df1d2548cedc)。For more information about how to localize the , , and any custom properties of a object, see [How to: Localize Site-Map Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be63b4a0-fb82-44b4-bdbb-df1d2548cedc). 有关的语法要求`explicitResourceKeys`集合，请参阅。For the syntax requirements of the `explicitResourceKeys` collection, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依赖于是与相关联来跟踪与站点图中的其他节点的关系。The relies on the that it is associated with to keep track of its relationships to other nodes in the site map. 此属性会调用方法，传递到其自身，若要检索的引用。This property calls the method, passing a reference to itself, to retrieve the . 如果启用了安全修整，返回当前用户有权查看的节点。If security trimming is enabled, only nodes that the current user is permitted to see are returned. 如果不允许用户以查看任何子节点，则返回空集合。If the user is not permitted to see any child nodes, an empty collection is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性假定站点地图提供程序实现其内部集合，这样当父节点检索其对象时，节点位于相同的顺序中站点图的显示方式。The property presumes that the site map provider implements its internal collections such that when a parent node retrieves its objects, the nodes are in the same order as they appear in the site map. 如果使用.NET Framework 集合类的实现中提供程序，选择实现的集合接口，如或类。If you use .NET Framework collection classes in an implementation of a provider, choose collections that implement the interface, such as the or class. 如果选择不实现的集合接口，如类，来执行简单的站点导航操作可能会发生意外的结果。If you choose collections that do not implement the interface, such as the class, unexpected results can occur for simple site navigation operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，该类是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序实现，使用属性用作查找键。The class, which is the default site map provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key. 因此，任何对象，它由提供程序的范围内，类必须具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any object that is used by the class must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 忽略前导空格和尾随空白字符。Leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of a object. `AccessSiteMapProvider`将其根节点存储为未包含任何行`parentnodeid`定义。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` stores its root node as a row that has no `parentnodeid` defined. 使用返回的行对象，和数据读取器中的值设置属性。The row is returned using an object, and properties are set from the values in the data reader. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#4)]
